author: spullara-codehaus
msg: change the forkmode junit to once rather than running them in the maven process.  this exposed an initialization bug in the xbean parser where custom editors were being registered in the xbean:generate goal and the tests depended on that.  also change the xbean:generate goal to a post goal so the test classes are compile before running the generator so you don't see warnings on a clean build.

author: dain
msg: Added support for automatic declaration of the init, destroy and factory methods.

author: jstrachan
msg: added support for Ant generation of constructor metadata

author: dain
msg: Split out salad xml configuration so it is easier to include in wiki snippits
